Posts.EditableText: Is it possible to only show the score pane and none of the others (compass, inventory etc)?
Posts.HTML: Is it possible to only show the score pane and none of the others (compass, inventory etc)?

Posts.EditableText:
Yes, but not obvious. See here:
https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/UI-Part-04:-Various-Tricks

Let me know if that is not clear.
